title: Chez Leontine
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vintage-decorated cozy tea room and shop offering a simple lunch until 2pm with always a vegetarian choice which is mostly replaced with mushroom or tofu. You get a salad with dressing, soup, and sandwich. Food is organic and mostly from local farms. Sells tea, teapots, cakes and cookies with gluten/lactose free possibilities. Wi-fi.
